definitions.definition: A sudden and unexpected or fantastic motion; a caper (from same etymology, see below) ; a gambol ; a prank , a trick.
A type of Renaissance landscape painting that places particular works of architecture in an unusual and often fictional setting.
A piece of music , usually fairly free in form and of a lively character.

main_definition: A sudden and unexpected or fantastic motion; a caper (from same etymology, see below) ; a gambol ; a prank , a trick.
secondary_definitions: ( painting ) A type of Renaissance landscape painting that places particular works of architecture in an unusual and often fictional setting.
( music ) A piece of music , usually fairly free in form and of a lively character.
